sense.name: an analytic or interpretive literary composition
sense.examples: There was an insightful essay on the Middle East in the Atlantic Monthly. The final exam has a problem section and two essay questions. It was a photographic essay of 9/!!. (figurative extension)

sense.name: an effort or attempt to do something
sense.examples: Critics maintain the war was a misjudged essay. Her essay to quiet the shouting mob did not succeed. The dog made an essay to snatch a sausage off the grill.

sense.name: a trial design for postage stamps or paper money
sense.examples: Three essays for the new stamps are being reviewed. Mary didn't like the essay for the new five-dollar bill.
